parts.text: {"word":"unsettle","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(人)を不安にさせる、動揺させる、落ち着かなくさせる","english_definition":"to make (someone) anxious or uneasy; to disturb the composure of.","examples":[{"sentence":"The news of the layoffs unsettled her.","translation":"解雇の知らせは彼女を不安にさせた。"},{"sentence":"The strange atmosphere of the house unsettled me.","translation":"その家の奇妙な雰囲気は私を落ち着かなくさせた。"},{"sentence":"His behavior unsettled the other guests.","translation":"彼の振る舞いは他の客を動揺させた。"}],"collocations":["unsettle someone's nerves (人の神経を逆なでする)","unsettle someone's mind (人の心を乱す)"],"synonyms":["disturb","disquiet","worry","agitate","perturb","discompose","fluster"],"antonyms":["settle","calm","reassure","compose"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(物事)を不安定にする、変動させる、混乱させる","english_definition":"":"to make (something) unstable or uncertain; to disrupt the established order of.","examples":[{"sentence":"The political crisis unsettled the economy.","translation":"政治危機は経済を不安定にした。"},{"sentence":"The new regulations unsettled the market.","translation":"新しい規制は市場を混乱させた。"},{"sentence":"The rumors unsettled the company's stock price.","translation":"その噂は会社の株価を変動させた。"}],"collocations":["unsettle the market (市場を不安定にする)","unsettle the balance (バランスを崩す)"],"synonyms":["destabilize","disrupt","derange","disorder","shake up"],"antonyms":["stabilize","secure","establish"]}],"etymology":{"value":"\"un-\" (否定の接頭辞) + \"settle\" に由来。元々は「落ち着かなくする」「定住させない」という意味合いが強かった。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ʌnˈsetl/","syllables":"un-set-tle"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["unsettle","unsettles"],"past_simple":"unsettled","past_participle":"unsettled","present_participle":"unsettling"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**unsettle**」は、人や状況を「落ち着かなくさせる」「不安にさせる」「不安定にする」という意味を持つ動詞です。人の感情や精神状態に対して使う場合は、不安や動揺を引き起こすことを意味します。経済や市場などに対して使う場合は、不安定化や混乱を引き起こすことを意味します。しばしば、予測不能な変化や出来事が原因で引き起こされる状況を表します。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The movie was very unsettling. I felt unsettledly.","correct":"✓ The movie was very unsettling. I felt unsettled.","note":"感情を表す場合は、形容詞の「unsettled」を使います。副詞の「unsettledly」は通常使いません。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The news unsettled to me.","correct":"✓ The news unsettled me.","note":"「unsettle」は他動詞なので、目的語を直接取ります。「to」は不要です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["unsettled (形容詞: 不安な、落ち着かない、未解決の)","unsettling (形容詞: 不安にさせる、動揺させる)","unsettlement (名詞: 不安定、未解決)"],"synonyms":["disconcert","disorient","rattle","unnerve"],"antonyms":["comfort","soothe","pacify","normalize"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低頻度 (Relatively low frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「**unsettle**」は、誰かや何かを不安にさせたり、不安定にさせたりすることを意味する動詞です。例えば、悪いニュースが人を「unsettle（不安にさせる）」、政治的な出来事が経済を「unsettle（不安定にする）」のように使われます。感情や状況を乱すような、ややフォーマルな文脈で使われることが多い単語です。関連語として、形容詞の「unsettled（落ち着かない、未解決の）」や「unsettling（不安にさせるような）」も覚えておくと良いでしょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The constant rain began to **unsettle** the hikers.","translation":"降り続く雨はハイカーたちを不安にさせ始めた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"不安にさせる"},{"sentence":"The rumors of a merger **unsettled** the employees.","translation":"合併の噂は従業員たちを動揺させた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"動揺させる"},{"sentence":"The sudden change in policy **unsettled** the market.","translation":"政策の突然の変更は市場を不安定にした。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"不安定にする"},{"sentence":"The experience left him feeling deeply **unsettled**.","translation":"その経験は彼を深く不安な気持ちにさせた。","type":"adjective (unsettled)","meaning_category":"不安な"}]}
